mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS follow_Id, u.name AS user_name, i.url AS profile_image FROM follow f JOIN user u ON f.follower_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN image i ON i.user_id = f.follower_id AND i.post_id IS NULL WHERE f.followee_id = #{userId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE follower_id = #{userId} AND followee_id = #{followUserId}
